nodes.text: An ExplorCorps scout ship was a large model of starship that was used by the Jedi Exploration Corps in the years following the New Sith Wars. They were used to meet with species wishing to join the Galactic Republic.

ExplorCorps ships were lightly armed, because they were mainly used for sensors and consumables.They were used extensively by the Jedi Order and a few of them were stationed on every Ordnance/Regional Depot.
